doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan is a Cardiac Surgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MS (CVTS). He is a Consultant, Cardiac Surgery at Apolo Hospital, Dhaka. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 12pm to 2pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
